description: An excel spreadsheet containing housing characteristic data for all Boston planning districts from the American Community Survey 2005-2009. The data in this spreadsheet were used to create the BRA's ACS planning district reports.

metadata.description: An excel spreadsheet containing housing characteristic data for all Boston planning districts from the American Community Survey 2005-2009. The data in this spreadsheet were used to create the BRA's ACS planning district reports.

name: Housing Characteristics, all planning districts: American Community Survey, 2005-2009
